configuration.description: Specify the Region or Regions that will contribute data to the rollup region.

metaStoreManagerRoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) used to create and update the AWS Glue table. This table contains partitions generated by the ingestion and normalization of AWS log sources and custom sources.

s3BucketArn.description: The ARN for the Amazon Security Lake Amazon S3 bucket.

tags.description: Key-value map of resource tags. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering DataLake resources.
